CancelMatching.document: This API is used to cancel matching.
CancelMatching.name: Cancels matching

DescribeMatchingProgress.document: This API is used to query the matching progress.
DescribeMatchingProgress.name: Queries matching progress

DescribeToken.document: This API is used to query the token of a Matchcode, which is used for verified the pushed message.
DescribeToken.name: Queries the token of a Matchcode

ModifyToken.document: This API is used to modify the token of a Matchcode.
ModifyToken.name: Modifies the token of a Matchcode

StartMatching.document: This API is used to pass in one player or multiple players to initiate match. Players within the same request will be assigned to the same game session.
StartMatching.name: Initiates match

AttributeMap.document: The map key and map value of the player attribute

members.document: Map key, supporting [a-zA-Z0-9-\.]*
members.name: Key

members.document: Map value
members.name: Value

members.document: MatchCode
members.name: MatchCode

members.document: The MatchTicket ID of the matchmaking to cancel
members.name: MatchTicketId

members.document: Error code
members.name: ErrCode

members.document: The unique request ID, which is returned for each request. RequestId is required for locating a problem.
members.name: RequestId

members.document: List of MatchTicket IDs. It can contain up to 12 IDs.
members.name: MatchTicketIds

members.document:
MatchTicket list
Note: this field may return `null`, indicating that no valid value is obtained.
members.name: MatchTickets

members.document:
Error code
Note: this field may return `null`, indicating that no valid value is obtained.
members.name: ErrCode

members.document: The unique request ID, which is returned for each request. RequestId is required for locating a problem.
members.name: RequestId

members.document: MatchCode
members.name: MatchCode

members.document:
The token corresponding to the current MatchCode. If the current MatchCode does not have a token, this parameter may not obtain a valid value.
Note: this field may return `null`, indicating that no valid value is obtained.
members.name: MatchToken

members.document:
The time period during which GPM will continuously push the original token in seconds when the token is replaced.
Note: this field may return `null`, indicating that no valid value is obtained.
members.name: CompatibleSpan

members.document: The unique request ID, which is returned for each request. RequestId is required for locating a problem.
members.name: RequestId

MTicket.document: The combination of MatchCode and MatchTicket ID.

members.document: MatchCode
members.name: MatchCode

members.document: MatchTicket ID
members.name: MatchTicketId

members.document: Attribute name. It can contain up to 128 characters, supporting [a-zA-Z0-9-\.]*.
members.name: Name

members.document: Attribute type. 0: number, 1: string. Default value: 0
members.name: Type

members.document: Numeric attribute value. Default value: 0.0
members.name: NumberValue

members.document: String attribute value. Up to 128 characters are allowed. Default value: ""
members.name: StringValue

members.document: List attribute value
members.name: ListValue

members.document: Map attribute value
members.name: MapValue

members.document: MatchTicket ID. It can contain up to 128 characters, supporting [a-zA-Z0-9-\.]*.
members.name: Id

members.document: MatchCode
members.name: MatchCode

members.document:
Different structure serialized results will be returned according to the MatchType.
Note: this field may return `null`, indicating that no valid value is obtained.
members.name: MatchResult

members.document:
Matchmaking type. Valid values: NORMAL, GSE
Note: this field may return `null`, indicating that no valid value is obtained.
members.name: MatchType

members.document: Player information list
members.name: Players

members.document: Matching status. Valid values: SEARCHING (matching), PLACING (pending match), COMPLETED (match completed), CANCELLED (match cancelled), TIMEDOUT (match timeouts), FAILED (match failed)
members.name: Status

members.document:
Matching status descriptions
Note: this field may return `null`, indicating that no valid value is obtained.
members.name: StatusMessage

members.document:
Reason for the matching status
Note: this field may return `null`, indicating that no valid value is obtained.
members.name: StatusReason

members.document: The time when the GPM received the matchmaking request, for example "2020-08-17T08:14:38.077Z".
members.name: StartTime

members.document:
The time when the matchmaking request stopped executing due to the completion, failure, timeout, or cancellation, for example "2020-08-17T08:14:38.077Z".
Note: this field may return `null`, indicating that no valid value is obtained.
members.name: EndTime

members.document: MatchCode
members.name: MatchCode

members.document: The time period during which GPM will continuously push the original token in seconds to the user when the token is replaced. Value range: 0 - 1800. Within the CompatibleSpan time period, user will receive the current and original token in the event notification.
members.name: CompatibleSpan

members.document: Token. It can contain 0 - 64 characters, supporting [a-zA-Z0-9-_.]. If this parameter is left empty, the token will be randomly generated by GPM.
members.name: MatchToken

members.document: Token that has been set successfully.
members.name: MatchToken

members.document:
The time period during which GPM will continuously push the original token in seconds to the user when the token is replaced.
Note: this field may return `null`, indicating that no valid value is obtained.
members.name: CompatibleSpan

members.document: The unique request ID, which is returned for each request. RequestId is required for locating a problem.
members.name: RequestId

members.document: Player ID. It can contain up to 128 characters, supporting [a-zA-Z\d-\._]*.
members.name: Id

members.document: Player nickname. Up to 128 characters are allowed.
members.name: Name

members.document: Player attribute for matching. Up to 10 attributes are supported.
members.name: MatchAttributes

members.document: Team name. A player can pass in a different team name, which can contain up to 128 characters, and support [a-zA-Z0-9-\.]*.
members.name: Team

members.document: Custom player status. This parameter will be passed through. Value range: [0, 99999]
members.name: CustomPlayerStatus

members.document: Custom player information. Up to 1024 characters are allowed. This parameter will be passed through.
members.name: CustomProfile

members.document: Number of delays in each area. Up to 20 delays are supported.
members.name: RegionLatencies

RegionLatency.document: The network delay time for players to reach different regions.

members.document:
Region
ap-beijing          North China (Beijing)
ap-chengdu          Southwest China (Chengdu)
ap-guangzhou           South China (Guangzhou)
ap-hongkong           Hong Kong/Macao/Taiwan (Hong Kong, China)
ap-seoul          Asia Pacific (Seoul)
ap-shanghai          East China (Shanghai)
ap-singapore          Southeast Asia (Singapore)
eu-frankfurt          Europe (Frankfurt)
na-siliconvalley          Western US (Silicon Valley)
na-toronto           North America (Toronto)
ap-mumbai           Asia Pacific (Mumbai)
na-ashburn          Eastern US (Virginia)
ap-bangkok           Asia Pacific (Bangkok)
eu-moscow           Europe (Moscow)
ap-tokyo           Asia Pacific (Tokyo)
members.name: Region

members.document: Delay time in ms. Value range: 0 - 999999
members.name: Latency

members.document: MatchCode
members.name: MatchCode

members.document: Player information. Up to 200 entries can be entered.
members.name: Players

members.document: MatchTicket ID, which can contain up to 128 characters and can only contain numbers, letters, “.”, and “-”. This parameter is left empty by default. When it is empty, the MatchTicket ID will be automatically generated by GPM.
members.name: MatchTicketId

members.document: Error code
members.name: ErrCode

members.document: MatchTicket ID. Up to 128 characters are allowed.
members.name: MatchTicketId

members.document: The unique request ID, which is returned for each request. RequestId is required for locating a problem.
members.name: RequestId
